Installing MLWorks

8 Organization of the installed MLWorks system

The installation process creates a number of subdirectories of your installation directory in order to store the various files that make up the MLWorks system. It is worth knowing a little about what these subdirectories contain.

basis

The Standard ML Basis library.

bin

The various scripts (mlworks, mlbatch.bat, and so on) and the runtime (main-windows.exe and main.exe, for windowing and console applications respectively).

documentation

The online documentation for MLWorks 2.0, which consists of the MLWorks User Guide, MLWorks Reference Manual, the Release Notes and a copy of these Installation Notes.

examples

Example code.

foreign

The MLWorks Foreign Interface library.

images

The various image files.

objects

Compiled files for basis, and utils.

pervasive

The MLWorks pervasive library.

scripts

Contains information for constructing the correct scripts for your system during the installation of MLWorks.

utils

Signatures related to the Standard ML Basis library.

winsys

The MLWorks Windows interface library.

MLWorks 2.0 Installation Notes - 12 Aug 1998
